title: Noam Chomsky "Sovereignty & World Order" 09/20/1999
description:
Noam Chomsky discusses "Sovereignty and World Order" and related examples and topics including Yogoslavia, East Timor, so-called "enlightened states," democracy versus capitalism, competence issues of intelligence agencies, etc. This lecture and Q&A took place at Kansas State University in Manhattan, KS on September 20, 1999. Chomsky talk begins at 11:20 of video, following an introduction by Lyman Baker. 
Filmed and originally distributed on VHS tape by Ralph Cole's JusticeVision "Democracy University."
